If you were any type of creature (other than human), what would you be and hwy?

post_info.post_title: What Kind of Creature are You?

A bear of course. Bears are large powerfull and furry.

Polar Bears are one of my favorite critters.
 Hyenas too...
 
 I'd probably be a trap door spider.
 
 Not very adventurous but, occasionally when you least expect it...BAM, gottcha!

If you were any type of creature (other than human), what would you be and hwy?

 
 A duck billed platapus

A giant tortoise.

 
 Not a dinosaur?
Croc, Wait for lunch to blunder by and roll with it.

A common house cat
 
 I just go around, do my own thing, and generally consider your needs secondary to my needs. My antics and their amusement value can make it worth it if you have the right personality though :p

Robocop
 
 Wait, what was the question again?
I think I'd be a red tailed fox.

Could I be a cartoon?
 
 
 If not, I think I'd go for being a wolf...or a polar bear.

It would be fun to be a bird, mainly to #### on people you don't like.
 
 Or a butterfly, as Bart Simpson put it, "Nobody ever expects the butterfly."
 
 Better yet... can I be God?
A Koala. I get to sleep for plenty of hours a day and people will stop looking me strangely for eating eucalyptus. What's not to like.
I am part-fox, part-coyote. Fox when I'm frisky and a sarcastic twit, and coyote when I'm cranky and want to be alone.
A dolphin hands down. strength, intelligence, mates, travel. What else could one want?

I'd probably say a bird of some sort. Flying would be incredible.
 
 
A bear of course. Bears are large powerfull and furry.

 You're bad Matthew. Bad, bad, bad ;)
I'd be an octopus: I'm not very agressive and have lots of questions to ask.

I'd be a dolphin because theyre playful, curious, social, benevolent and intelligent. Or, a butterfly because they're carefree, artfully colorful, and the result of an incredible transformation.
 
 If we're talking mythical creatures, then perhaps some sort of fey prince, or Quetzecoatl, the winged rainbow-serpent Aztec creation god. He's pretty cool beans,

Some sort of eagle: high up on the winds, surveying everything, majestic, watching puny humans argue the toss and fight about inconsequential matters, then dying for it.
 
 Yup, an eagle!
I would be a monkey named Bleb.
Coyote. I hear them every night where I'm at and they seem to be having a heck of a time. That, and I could hunt without PeTA crawling up my rear end.
